history.content:
They want to finish hiring tutors for CS61A by the end of April, so no it's not possible.

___

I'm currently taking cs70 and asked my TA if I could apply to be a reader/tutor -- he said yes, but that paperwork and hiring would be delayed until my grades came out. Perhaps it is case by case -- I'd recommend reaching out to the instructors themselves!
They want to finish hiring tutors for CS61A by the end of April, so no it's not possible.

I'm interested in being a summer Tutor/Reader for 61A, however I'm taking it this semester and grades have yet to come out, however I have been doing very well on both midterms and all projects and assignments to date. Only related coursework I have would be in CS 8 and Data 8. Would decisions be released before semester grades are out? Or would I just have to wait until fall to be a tutor/reader? Thank you!
history.subject: Summer Tutor/Reader for current (SP17) course
